name: Backelite
description: Backelite is an agency that accompanies leading brands and startups in designing, creating, and optimizing digital services around their customers’ needs. They design, develop, and optimize digital products for smartphones, tablets, computers, and connected TVs and objects. Founded in 2006, they are an award-winning international agency. They work with leading brands on B2C, B2E and B2B projects, including: Air France, Voyages-SNCF.com, Le Fooding, Galeries Lafayette, ING and more.
